title: Zoo babies
brief_description: Join Channel TEN’s Lynday Davies as she follows the lives of baby animals at Sydney’s Taronga and Western Plains Zoos. The zoo witnesses the birth of many babies throughout the year, with thousands of new additions to the zoo ‘family’. You’ll see the birth of a baby gorilla and giraffe, as well as an assortment of all creatures great and small who are cared for by zoo staff.
